Course Description: THIS COURSE IS INTENDED FOR STUDENTS DESIRING A WORKING KNOWLEDGE OF COMPUTERIZED ACCOUNTING USING SOFTWARE COMMONLY USED IN BUSINESS. THE COURSE COVERS THE FIVE MAJOR SYSTEMS COMMONLY FOUND IN COMPUTERIZED ACCOUNTING ENVIRONMENTS  GENERAL LEDGER, DEPRECIATION, ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE, ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, AND PAYROLL.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
